mapper.sql: ID, Create_time, Modify_time, Train_team_id, Member_id, Name, Type, Sex, Working_age, Head_image, Lecture_style, Vitae, Education, Honor, Teach_class, Phone, Manager
mapper.select: SELECT tc.*,tt.ID ttID, tt.`Title` ttTitle, tt.`City_id` ttCity_id FROM TrainCoach tc LEFT JOIN TrainTeam tt ON tc.`Train_team_id` = tt.`ID` where tc.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(0) from TrainCoach where Train_team_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into TrainCoach (ID, Create_time, Modify_time, Train_team_id, Member_id, Name, Type, Sex, Working_age, Head_image, Lecture_style, Vitae, Education, Honor, Teach_class, Phone, Manager) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{trainTeamId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workingAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{headImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lectureStyle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vitae,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{honor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teachClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manager,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update TrainCoach
Create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Train_team_id = #{trainTeamId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Working_age = #{workingAge,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Head_image = #{headImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Lecture_style = #{lectureStyle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Vitae = #{vitae,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Education = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Honor = #{honor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Teach_class = #{teachClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Manager = #{manager,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
